verses.verse: A <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But a <S%H8003>just<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%> is his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.
When <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, then <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H7036>shame<s%>; But with the <S%H6800>lowly<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
The <S%H8538>integrity<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5148>guide<s%> <S%H5558>them<s%>; But the perverseness of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> shall destroy <S%H7703>them<s%>.
Riches <S%H1952><s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> not in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%>; But <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>delivereth<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> shall <S%H3474>direct<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his own <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>.
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H898>them<s%>; But the treacherous shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their own <S%H1942>iniquity<s%>.
When a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4194>dieth<s%>, his <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; And the <S%H8431>hope<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is delivered <S%H2502>out<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, And the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> cometh in his <S%H935>stead<s%>.

With his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> the <S%H2611>godless<s%> man <S%H7843>destroyeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; But through <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>.
When it goeth <S%H2898>well<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H5970>rejoiceth<s%>; And when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, there is <S%H7440>shouting<s%>.
By the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> the <S%H7176>city<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%>; But it is <S%H2040>overthrown<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
He that <S%H936>despiseth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom<s%>; But a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> holdeth his <S%H2790>peace<s%>.

He that goeth about as a <S%H1980>tale-bearer<s%> <S%H1540>revealeth<s%> <S%H5475>secrets<s%>; But he that is of a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3680>concealeth<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%>.
Where no wise <S%H8458>guidance<s%> <S%H5971>is<s%>, the people <S%H5307>falleth<s%>; But in the <S%H5971>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> there is <S%H8668>safety<s%>.
He that is <S%H6148>surety<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall <S%H7321>smart<s%> for <S%H8130>it<s%>; But he that hateth <S%H8628>suretyship<s%> is <S%H982>secure<s%>.
A <S%H2580>gracious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8551>obtaineth<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%>; And <S%H6184>violent<s%> men <S%H8551>obtain<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>.
The <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> doeth <S%H1580>good<s%> to his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>; But he that is <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H5916>troubleth<s%> his own <S%H7607>flesh<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6213>earneth<s%> <S%H8267>deceitful<s%> <S%H6468>wages<s%>; But he that <S%H2232>soweth<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> hath a <S%H571>sure<s%> <S%H7938>reward<s%>.
He that is stedfast in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall attain unto <S%H2416>life<s%>; And he that <S%H7291>pursueth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> doeth it to his own <S%H4194>death<s%>.

They that are <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But such as are <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in their <S%H1870>way<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.

Though <S%H3027>hand<s%> join in <S%H3027>hand<s%>, the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>; But the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>.
As a <S%H5141>ring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in a <S%H2386>swine<s%>'s <S%H639>snout<s%>, So is a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that is <S%H5493>without<s%> <S%H2940>discretion<s%>.
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is only <S%H2896>good<s%>; But the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.

There <S%H3426>is<s%> that <S%H6340>scattereth<s%>, and <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> yet <S%H2820>more<s%>; And there is that withholdeth more than is <S%H3476>meet<s%>, but it tendeth only to <S%H4270>want<s%>.
The <S%H1293>liberal<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be made <S%H1878>fat<s%>; And he that <S%H7301>watereth<s%> shall be watered also <S%H3384>himself<s%>.

He that <S%H4513>withholdeth<s%> <S%H1250>grain<s%>, the <S%H3816>people<s%> shall <S%H5344>curse<s%> <S%H1293>him<s%>; But blessing shall be upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that selleth <S%H7666>it<s%>.
He that diligently <S%H7836>seeketh<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%>; But he that <S%H1875>searcheth<s%> after <S%H7451>evil<s%>, it shall come unto <S%H935>him<s%>.
He that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in his <S%H6239>riches<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> as the green <S%H5929>leaf<s%>.

He that <S%H5916>troubleth<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>; And the <S%H191>foolish<s%> shall be <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; And he that is <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3947>winneth<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>.
Behold <S%H6662><s%>, the righteous shall be <S%H7999>recompensed<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: How much more the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H2398>sinner<s%>!
